com.schneewind.timetracking.timetracking

Class TimeTrackingData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.schneewind.timetracking.timetracking.TimeTrackingData

  • public class TimeTrackingData
extends java.lang.Object
    a class for storing the instances of the TimeTrackers during runtime. conatains methods for reading/writing TimeTrackers to files by using the FileHelper methods

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      TimeTrackerListAdapter listAdapter

    • Method Detail

      • readTrackersFromDefaultFile

        public void readTrackersFromDefaultFile()
        reads Trackers from the default file and stores them in this TimeTrackingData object requires timeTrackingActivity of this TimeTrackingData instance to be assigned

      • writeTrackersToDefaultFile

        public void writeTrackersToDefaultFile()
        saves the Trackers from this TimeTrackingData object to the default file requires timeTrackingActivity of this TimeTrackingData instance to be assigned

      • exportTrackers

        public void exportTrackers()
        creates FileHelper and uses its export function. requires timeTrackingActivity of this TimeTrackingData instance to be assigned

      • addTimeToAllActiveTrackers

        public void addTimeToAllActiveTrackers(int time)
        adds a given amount of time to all active trackers
        Parameters:
        time - time in seconds

      • addTimeTracker

        public void addTimeTracker(TimeTracker newTracker)
        Adds a new TimeTracker
        Parameters:
        newTracker - the TimeTracker to be added

      • removeTimeTracker

        public void removeTimeTracker(TimeTracker tracker)
        removes a given TimeTracker from the list
        Parameters:
        tracker - the tracker to delete (use getTimeTracker() or findTimeTracker() if necessary)

      • getTimeTracker

        public TimeTracker getTimeTracker(int index)
        Returns the timetracker at the given index in the list
        Parameters:
        index - index of the timetracker in the list
        Returns:
        the TimeTracker object at the given index

      • findTimeTracker

        public TimeTracker findTimeTracker(java.lang.String name)
        finds and returns the timetracker of a given name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the tracker
        Returns:
        the TimeTracker with the given name, returns null if no such tracker exists

      • getTrackerCount

        public int getTrackerCount()
        returns the number of trackers that are stored
        Returns:
        an integer

      • getActiveTrackerCount

        public int getActiveTrackerCount()
        returns the number of trackers that are active
        Returns:
        an integer
